name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PaperSave7 Batch Integration in Blackbaud CRM

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plug-in enhances the experience of using PaperSave 7 within Revenue Batches in Blackbaud CRM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin extension is very useful for the Blackbaud CRM web application users who uses the Revenue Batches in the application. The users can install this plugin in order to enable the functionality such that user can use different keyboard shortcuts which they desire for performing specific actions in the application web pages.
